001package edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.hilt;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import androidx.room.Room;
005import dagger.Module;
006import dagger.Provides;
007import dagger.hilt.InstallIn;
008import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
009import dagger.hilt.components.SingletonComponent;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.model.dao.ApodDao;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.service.ApodDatabase;
012import javax.inject.Singleton;
013
014@Module
015@InstallIn(SingletonComponent.class)
016public class DatabaseModule {
017
018  @Provides
019  @Singleton
020  ApodDatabase provideDatabase(@ApplicationContext Context context) {
021    return Room.databaseBuilder(context, ApodDatabase.class, ApodDatabase.getName())
022        .build();
023  }
024
025  @Provides
026  @Singleton
027  ApodDao provideApodDao(ApodDatabase database) {
028    return database.getApodDao();
029  }
030
031}
